Bases: arq.ste.serializers.serializer.Serializer[int]

save(value: int) → bytes

Serializes the given value into a byte string.

Returns

the value in serialized form

load(blob: bytes) → int

Restores the value of type T from the given blob.

the original value

arq.ste.serializers.serializer module

class Serializer

Bases: abc.ABC, Generic[arq.ste.serializers.serializer.T]

Serializes a particular data type T. Used to allow users to specify how items are serialized prior to storing them in an encrypted data structure.

abstract save(value: arq.ste.serializers.serializer.T) → bytes

Serializes the given value into a byte string.

Parameters

value¶ – the value to serialize

Returns

the value in serialized form

Restores the value of type T from the given blob.

Parameters

blob¶ – the byte string to deserialize, as previously generated from save()

Returns

the original value
